title: Fruit brochettes with rosewater cashew cream
ingredients: ['12 ripe apricots, about 300 g (10½ oz) in total', '32 ripe sweet cherries, about 250 g (8½ oz) in total, stoned', 'Rosewater cashew cream', '100 g (3½ oz) unsalted cashew nuts', '120 ml (4 fl oz) apple juice', '2 tsp rosewater', 'To decorate (optional)', '1 tsp icing sugar', 'fresh mint leaves']
